meanings.definition: A small fish with a long, slender body and a tubular snout.
meanings.sent1: The pipefish swam gracefully through the seaweed.
meanings.sent2: I saw a colorful pipefish while snorkeling in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The pipefish tried to play hide-and-seek with the seahorse.
meanings.sent4: She compared his long, slender body to a pipefish.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium had a tank dedicated to showcasing the unique pipefish.

meanings.definition: Any of various small fishes of the family Syngnathidae, having a long, tubular snout and a body encased in bony rings.
meanings.sent1: The pipefish in the tank looked like a tiny dragon.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of pipefish to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The pipefish family reunion was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace of pearls resembled the bony rings of a pipefish.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium guide pointed out the unique features of the pipefish to the visitors.
